item.title: Time To Play Video
item.description:
åŸå› 

å¸Œæœ›å¯ä»¥è®©ç”µè„‘æ¯å¤©æ—©ä¸Šç”µè„‘ä¸Šæ‰“å¼€çš„ç½‘é¡µå®šæ—¶æ’­æ”¾éŸ³ä¹æˆ–è€…è‹±è¯­å£è¯­è§†é¢‘ï¼Œåƒé—¹é’Ÿä¸€æ ·å«æˆ‘èµ·åºŠã€‚

å®ç° 

// ==UserScript==
// @name         å®šæ—¶å”¤é†’æ’­æ”¾å™¨
// @namespace    http://tampermonkey.net/
// @version      0.2
// @description  åœ¨æŒ‡å®šæ—¶é—´è‡ªåŠ¨æ’­æ”¾å½“å‰é¡µé¢çš„è§†é¢‘ï¼Œå¸¦æœ‰å¯è®¾ç½®çš„æ§åˆ¶ç•Œé¢å’Œå€’è®¡æ—¶ã€‚
// @author       Your Name
// @match        *://*/*
// @grant        GM_setValue
// @grant        GM_getValue
// @grant        GM_addStyle
// ==/UserScript==

(function() {
    'use strict';

    console.log('è„šæœ¬å¼€å§‹è¿è¡Œ');

    function init() {
        console.log('DOM åŠ è½½å®Œæˆï¼Œå¼€å§‹åˆå§‹åŒ–');

        try {
            // --- æ ·å¼éƒ¨åˆ† ---
            GM_addStyle(`
                #wakeup-float-btn {
                    position: fixed;
                    top: 20px;
                    right: 20px;
                    width: 50px;
                    height: 50px;
                    background-color: #4CAF50;
                    color: white;
                    border-radius: 50%;
                    display: flex;
                    justify-content: center;
                    align-items: center;
                    font-size: 18px;
                    cursor: grab;
                    z-index: 999999;
                    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
                    transition: background-color 0.3s;
                    user-select: none;
                }
                #wakeup-float-btn:hover {
                    background-color: #45a049;
                }
                #wakeup-float-btn:active {
                    cursor: grabbing;
                }
                #wakeup-control-panel {
                    position: fixed;
                    top: 50%;
                    left: 50%;
                    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
                    background-color: white;
                    border: 1px solid #ccc;
                    border-radius: 8px;
                    padding: 20px;
                    box-shadow: 0 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
                    z-index: 1000000;
                    display: none;
                    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
                    min-width: 300px;
                }
                #wakeup-control-panel h3 {
                    margin-top: 0;
                    margin-bottom: 20px;
                    color: #333;
                    text-align: center;
                }
                #wakeup-control-panel label {
                    display: block;
                    margin-bottom: 8px;
                    color: #555;
                }
                #wakeup-control-panel input[type="time"] {
                    width: calc(100% - 20px);
                    padding: 10px;
                    margin-bottom: 15px;
                    border: 1px solid #ddd;
                    border-radius: 4px;
                    font-size: 16px;
                }
                #wakeup-control-panel button {
                    background-color: #007BFF;
                    color: white;
                    padding: 10px 15px;
                    border: none;
                    border-radius: 4px;
                    cursor: pointer;
                    font-size: 16px;
                    margin-top: 10px;
                }
                #wakeup-control-panel button:hover {
                    background-color: #0056b3;
                }
                #wakeup-time-display {
                    margin-top: 15px;
                }
                #wakeup-time-display p {
                    margin: 5px 0;
                    color: #666;
                }
                #wakeup-close-btn {
                    position: absolute;
                    top: 10px;
                    right: 10px;
                    width: 24px;
                    height: 24px;
                    background-color: #f0f0f0;
                    border: none;
                    border-radius: 50%;
                    font-size: 16px;
                    line-height: 24px;
                    text-align: center;
                    cursor: pointer;
                    color: #666;
                    transition: all 0.3s ease;
                    padding: 0;
                    display: flex;
                    justify-content: center;
                    align-items: center;
                }
                #wakeup-close-btn:hover {
                    background-color: #ff4444;
                    color: white;
                }
            `);

            // åˆ›å»ºæµ®åŠ¨æŒ‰é’®
            const floatButton = document.createElement('div');
            floatButton.id = 'wakeup-float-btn';
            floatButton.textContent = 'ğŸ¶';
            document.body.appendChild(floatButton);
            console.log('æµ®åŠ¨æŒ‰é’®å·²åˆ›å»º');

            // åˆ›å»ºæ§åˆ¶é¢æ¿
            const controlPanel = document.createElement('div');
            controlPanel.id = 'wakeup-control-panel';
            controlPanel.innerHTML = `
                <button id="wakeup-close-btn">Ã—</button>
                <h3>å®šæ—¶æ’­æ”¾è®¾ç½®</h3>
                <label for="set-play-time">è®¾ç½®æ’­æ”¾æ—¶é—´:</label>
                <input type="time" id="set-play-time">
                <button id="save-play-time">ä¿å­˜è®¾ç½®</button>
                <div id="wakeup-time-display">
                    <p>å½“å‰æ—¶é—´: <span id="current-time"></span></p>
                    <p>ç›®æ ‡æ—¶é—´: <span id="target-time">æœªè®¾ç½®</span></p>
                    <p>å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´: <span id="countdown-time">æœªè®¾ç½®</span></p>
                </div>
            `;
            document.body.appendChild(controlPanel);
            console.log('æ§åˆ¶é¢æ¿å·²åˆ›å»º');

            // æ·»åŠ æ‹–åŠ¨åŠŸèƒ½
            let isDragging = false;
            let currentX;
            let currentY;
            let initialX;
            let initialY;

            floatButton.addEventListener('mousedown', function(e) {
                isDragging = true;
                initialX = e.clientX - floatButton.offsetLeft;
                initialY = e.clientY - floatButton.offsetTop;

                floatButton.style.cursor = 'grabbing';
            });

            document.addEventListener('mousemove', function(e) {
                if (!isDragging) return;

                e.preventDefault();

                currentX = e.clientX - initialX;
                currentY = e.clientY - initialY;

                // ç¡®ä¿æŒ‰é’®ä¸ä¼šè¢«æ‹–å‡ºè§†çª—
                currentX = Math.max(0, Math.min(currentX, window.innerWidth - floatButton.offsetWidth));
                currentY = Math.max(0, Math.min(currentY, window.innerHeight - floatButton.offsetHeight));

                floatButton.style.left = currentX + 'px';
                floatButton.style.top = currentY + 'px';
                floatButton.style.right = 'auto';
            });

            document.addEventListener('mouseup', function() {
                isDragging = false;
                floatButton.style.cursor = 'grab';
            });

            // è·å–ä¿å­˜çš„æ—¶é—´
            const savedTime = GM_getValue('targetTime', '');
            if (savedTime) {
                document.getElementById('set-play-time').value = savedTime;
                document.getElementById('target-time').textContent = savedTime;
            }

            // è®¡ç®—å¹¶æ›´æ–°å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´
            function updateCountdown() {
                const targetTimeStr = GM_getValue('targetTime', '');
                if (!targetTimeStr) return;

                const now = new Date();
                const [targetHour, targetMinute] = targetTimeStr.split(':').map(Number);
                let targetTime = new Date();
                targetTime.setHours(targetHour, targetMinute, 0, 0);

                // å¦‚æœç›®æ ‡æ—¶é—´å·²è¿‡ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸ºæ˜å¤©
                if (targetTime < now) {
                    targetTime.setDate(targetTime.getDate() + 1);
                }

                const diff = targetTime - now;
                const hours = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60 * 60));
                const minutes = Math.floor((diff % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
                const seconds = Math.floor((diff % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);

                document.getElementById('countdown-time').textContent =
                    `${hours}å°æ—¶${minutes}åˆ†é’Ÿ${seconds}ç§’`;
            }

            // æ›´æ–°å½“å‰æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
            function updateCurrentTime() {
                const now = new Date();
                document.getElementById('current-time').textContent =
                    now.toLocaleTimeString('zh-CN', { hour12: false });
                updateCountdown(); // åŒæ—¶æ›´æ–°å€’è®¡æ—¶
            }

            // æ£€æŸ¥å¹¶æ’­æ”¾è§†é¢‘çš„å‡½æ•°
            function checkAndPlay() {
                const targetTimeStr = GM_getValue('targetTime', '');
                if (!targetTimeStr) return;

                const now = new Date();
                const [targetHour, targetMinute] = targetTimeStr.split(':').map(Number);
                const currentHour = now.getHours();
                const currentMinute = now.getMinutes();

                if (currentHour === targetHour && currentMinute === targetMinute) {
                    console.log('æ—¶é—´åˆ°ï¼Œå°è¯•æ’­æ”¾è§†é¢‘...');
                    const videos = document.querySelectorAll('video');
                    if (videos.length > 0) {
                        videos.forEach(video => {
                            video.muted = false;
                            video.volume = 1;
                            const playPromise = video.play();
                            if (playPromise !== undefined) {
                                playPromise
                                    .then(() => console.log('è§†é¢‘å¼€å§‹æ’­æ”¾'))
                                    .catch(err => {
                                        console.error('æ’­æ”¾å¤±è´¥:', err);
                                        // å°è¯•é™éŸ³æ’­æ”¾
                                        video.muted = true;
                                        video.play().catch(e => console.error('é™éŸ³æ’­æ”¾ä¹Ÿå¤±è´¥:', e));
                                    });
                            }
                        });
                    } else {
                        console.log('é¡µé¢ä¸Šæ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°è§†é¢‘å…ƒç´ ');
                    }
                }
            }

            // äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
            floatButton.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (!isDragging) { // åªåœ¨éæ‹–åŠ¨çŠ¶æ€ä¸‹å“åº”ç‚¹å‡»
                    controlPanel.style.display = 'block';
                }
            });

            // å…³é—­æŒ‰é’®äº‹ä»¶
            document.getElementById('wakeup-close-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
                controlPanel.style.display = 'none';
            });

            document.getElementById('save-play-time').addEventListener('click', () => {
                const timeInput = document.getElementById('set-play-time').value;
                if (timeInput) {
                    GM_setValue('targetTime', timeInput);
                    document.getElementById('target-time').textContent = timeInput;
                    alert('æ—¶é—´è®¾ç½®å·²ä¿å­˜ï¼');
                    controlPanel.style.display = 'none'; // ä¿å­˜åè‡ªåŠ¨å…³é—­é¢æ¿
                } else {
                    alert('è¯·é€‰æ‹©æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ—¶é—´ï¼');
                }
            });

            // å¯åŠ¨å®šæ—¶æ›´æ–°
            setInterval(updateCurrentTime, 1000); // æ¯ç§’æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´æ˜¾ç¤º
            setInterval(checkAndPlay, 30000); // æ¯30ç§’æ£€æŸ¥ä¸€æ¬¡æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦æ’­æ”¾

            // ç«‹å³æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡æ›´æ–°
            updateCurrentTime();
            checkAndPlay();

        } catch (error) {
            console.error('è„šæœ¬åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥:', error);
        }
    }

    // ç¡®ä¿åœ¨é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåè¿è¡Œ
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
    } else {
        init();
    }
})();

item.title: Update Fork
item.description:
åŸå› 

å¸Œæœ›å¯ä»¥è‡ªåŠ¨åˆå¹¶æ‰€æœ‰ Fork é¡¹ç›®çš„ä¸Šæ¸¸æäº¤

å®ç° 

// ==UserScript==
// @name         Github AutoMergeFork
// @namespace    http://tampermonkey.net/
// @version      0.1
// @description  try to take over the world!
// @author       clh021@gmail.com
// @match        https://github.com/clh021?
// @icon         https://www.google.com/s2/favicons?sz=64&domain=github.com
// @grant        none
// ==/UserScript==

(function () {
  "use strict";
  const targetName = "auto_merge_fork_win_";
  function openAllForkProj() {
    let forkProjs = document.querySelectorAll(".rgh-discussion-links");
    forkProjs.forEach((e, i) => {
      console.log(i, e.href);
      window.open(e.href, `${targetName}${i}`);
    }); // éœ€è¦åœ¨chromeä¸­å…è®¸å¤šæ¬¡å¼¹å‡ºçª—å£
  }
  function addUpdateForkBtn() {
    let forkDiv = document.createElement("div");
    forkDiv.append("UpdateFork");
    forkDiv.id = "fork-all-proj-area";
    forkDiv.style =
      "border: 1px solid darkgreen;color: darkgreen;cursor: pointer;padding: 5px;position: fixed;right: 10px;top: 65px;z-index: 10000;";
    document.body.append(forkDiv);
    document
      .querySelector("#fork-all-proj-area")
      .addEventListener("click", openAllForkProj);
  }
  function hasMerge() {
    let fetchMessage = document.querySelectorAll(
      ".Layout-main > .Box > .flex-auto"
    )[0].innerText;
    return fetchMessage.indexOf("behind") > 0;
  }
  function doMerge() {
    // document.querySelectorAll('.js-fetch-upstream-summary')[0].click();
    console.log("doMerge...");
    setTimeout(() => {
      let btn = document.querySelectorAll(
        ".js-fetch-upstream-no-conflicts-ui > .Box-row > div > form > button"
      )[0];
      if (btn) {
        btn.click(); // åˆå¹¶å®Œæ¯•åï¼Œé¡µé¢åˆ·æ–°ä¼šå†è§¦å‘æ²¡æœ‰åˆå¹¶å†…å®¹çš„æ£€æŸ¥è€Œ è‡ªåŠ¨å…³é—­ ã€‚
      } else {
        doMerge();
      }
    }, 2000);
  }
  function autoClose() {
    if (name.startsWith(targetName)) {
      // æ˜¯è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰“å¼€çš„é¡µé¢ï¼Œåº”è¯¥è€ƒè™‘åœ¨æ²¡æœ‰åˆå¹¶å†…å®¹çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨å…³é—­ã€‚
      window.close();
    }
  }
  function inForkPageList() {
    let url = document.URL;
    if (url.startsWith("https://github.com/") && url.indexOf("type=fork") > 0) {
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  }
  function main() {
    if (inForkPageList()) {
      addUpdateForkBtn();
    } else if (document.URL.startsWith("https://github.com/")) {
      if (hasMerge()) {
        console.log("æœ‰å¯ä»¥åˆå¹¶çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œè¦åˆå¹¶å—ï¼Ÿ");
        setTimeout(() => {
          document.querySelectorAll(".js-fetch-upstream-summary")[0].click();
          doMerge();
        }, 2000);
      } else {
        autoClose();
      }
    }
  }
  window.addEventListener("load", main, false);
})();
